title: PR #161 Did Not Generate Release - Timeline

events.details: Feature implementation with changeset for --generate-title flag and retry logic
JS CI/CD Pipeline triggered by PR #158 merge
Release for PR #158 changes - includes --generate-title flag and retry logic
JS CI/CD Pipeline triggered by PR #160 merge
Release for PR #160 changes - Kilo Gateway provider
Documentation-only changes (README.md and case study files)
Path filters excluded docs-only changes from triggering workflow
Expected behavior - no code changes, no changeset, no release needed

root_cause.description: Workflow path filters only include js/**, scripts/**, and .github/workflows/js.yml. PR #161 only modified README.md and docs/** which are not in the filter list.
root_cause.justification: This is expected behavior. Documentation-only PRs should not trigger releases.
